title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it fails to get selected.

OB: Any item selected in the library outline view is not highlighted or visually indicated as selected.

EB: Any item selected in the library outline view should be highlighted or visually indicated as selected.

SR: 

1. Open the library file.
2. Add a label to the library file.
3. Select the label item in the library outline view.
